* Iron Raptor smiled slightly as she received the transmission from 
Plintissa, so she had decided to come back after all.
She sighed as she entered into the bridge and saw her squid friend.*

" Weapon's hold on level 3, just down from the CR chambers. Pick something 
and head out to the Island's borders."

* She looked over and saw Tavatron and Dinobot, so her other friend had made 
one of her own. She smiled and looked back at Plintissa...*

" Well, go. Get a weapon and I'll be waiting right here for you."
